name: LeBron James

structured_info.background: Born December 30, 1984, LeBron James is widely regarded as one of the greatest basketball players ever. He holds the NBA's all-time leading scorer title, has won 4 NBA championships, and secured 3 Olympic gold medals. He has earned recognition as a 3x Sports Illustrated Sportsperson of the Year and a 2x National High School Player of the Year. Currently in his 21st season, he recently exercised his player option for the 2025-26 season.

summary: LeBron James is a highly decorated professional basketball player currently playing for the Los Angeles Lakers, considered one of the all-time greats in the sport with numerous championships, scoring records, and Olympic medals. He recently extended his contract and continues to perform at a high level, evidenced by recent game performances.
